history_turns: A (female, neutral, normal, normal): It’s kind of eerie being without power like this.
B (male, neutral, normal, low): Yeah, our street seems completely dark.
A (female, fearful, fast, normal): You seem anxious about it. Is everything okay?
B (male, sad, slow, low): I just don’t like being in the dark, it makes me feel uneasy.
response_of_current_style_1: B (male, neutral, slow, low): Yeah, it really is. But hopefully it won't last long.
response_of_current_style_2: B (male, sad, normal, loud): I know what you mean, I just hope we get some light soon.
response_of_current_style_3: B (male, surprised, fast, normal): Seriously! I didn’t expect this to last so long.

history_turns: A (female, neutral, normal, normal): Can you believe there’s a power outage again? It’s so inconvenient.
B (male, angry, fast, loud): I know, right? It feels like it’s happening every month now!
A (female, sad, slow, low): You seem really upset about this. Is it just the outage that’s bothering you?
B (male, angry, normal, normal): It's more than the outage... I had plans tonight, everything gets messed up!
response_of_current_style_1: B (male, happy, normal, normal): I appreciate it! Let's find a way to make the best of it!
response_of_current_style_2: B (male, neutral, fast, loud): Yeah, it’s such a hassle. Hopefully, it gets resolved soon.
response_of_current_style_3: B (male, sad, slow, low): Thanks for understanding. It’s frustrating to lose plans like that.

history_turns: A (female, neutral, normal, normal): Wow, the power's out! Do you have any flashlights?
B (male, sad, slow, low): No, I can't find any! It’s really unsettling.
A (female, neutral, normal, normal): I get that. It's pretty dark in here.
B (male, angry, fast, loud): I hate how this always happens. Why can't they keep the power on?
response_of_current_style_1: B (male, neutral, normal, normal): Yeah, totally inconvenient. I wish they would fix it already.
response_of_current_style_2: B (male, sad, slow, low): I know, it seems like everything is going wrong right now. Are you alright?
response_of_current_style_3: B (male, angry, fast, loud): I feel you! It's infuriating! Why can't they get their act together?
